reviewText:
You gotta love Shirley Temple. She was a good star that didn't become corrupt by the Hollywood scene.
Maybe you have to be old to watch them, but I wanted them when my children were young so they could
see what we grew up with. So, I have it a 5-star rating, because I do love Shirley!
It was a gift so I really didn't watch but I remember these from years ago and they were always a joy to watch

I ordered this Dvd thinking wot a great deal at a buck fifty...well one gets wot one pays for...doesnt one... Grrrrr...This DvD has only 1 movie on it..the packaging looks handmade...the label that is...looks like a photo copy, and on the label it states 8 movies on 1 disc...YAH RIGHT!!! it only has the one..it is a burned disc...a rip off...it has generic options when you play it..."play and menu for scene selections"...and half way through this movie there is a problem with the sync...there is no SYNC! I am so not happy. Shirley Temple Classics - 8 Films again i say save your money! Sincerely DITA. >=0(

This is a great collection of Shirley temple movies.
I would reccommend them to anyone.
